title: Fun with book tour
author: VD
content_html: Another rare Pepe! I had no idea so many Dread Ilk were also Scalzi fans. It’s the rare author who can really reach across the political divide these days.
content_text: Another rare Pepe! I had no idea so many Dread Ilk were also Scalzi fans. It’s the rare author who can really reach across the political divide these days.
